makers.displaymaker: Workshop of Giovanni Battista Cima da Conegliano, Italian, 1459/60–1517/18

texts.textentryhtml: Francis H. Clarke, Esq., Norwood (d. 1926); private collection (?Clark) until 1926; Christie's, London, July 5, 1926, lot 44, to Mori; Felix Warburg (by 1928-1937); Mrs. Felix Warburg (1937-1941); gift to Princeton University Art Museum.
